content: ellie the butterfly by faerie stitches © 2021 faerie stitches all rights reserved this pattern is written using us terminology and is worked in continuous rounds unless otherwise stated i recommend you always mark the start of each round using a stitch marker if made with the described materials the toy will be about 13cm / 5 1 inches tall from the tip of the antennas to the bottom materials ♥ 1 worsted yarn i used drops you #8 in light lilac and grey as well as old pink for the embroidery one ball of each color should be enough 2 crochet hook i used 2 5mm 3 stuffing 4 black embroidery thread 5 embroidery/tapestry needle 6 stitch markers abbreviations st stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet hd half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet sltl slip_stitch increase increase 2 single_crochet in same st decrease invisible decrease round round note about color changes when the pattern indicates a color change it s important to remember that the yarn change starts one stitch earlier in the stitch before the color change insert hook yarn over and pull loop through stitch using the old color then yarn over in the new color and pull loop through both loops on hook the yarn of the color you aren t using is carried from behind color changes are indicated by the new color inside parentheses need help if you have any questions suggestions notice an error in the pattern or want to share a photo of your finished amigurumi feel free to send me an email at faerie stitches@gmail com or contact me through instagram at @faerie_stitches page 1 head and body guide it to the proper shape by placing a pin in the corner of the eye secure the thread to the light lilac place where the pin is by coming out and going round 1 single_crochet in next 3 st increase in next st x 6 30 3 embroider the mouth according to image 2 round 6 single_crochet in all 30 st 30 pull the embroidery thread to the front and to round 7 single_crochet in next 2 st increase in next st single_crochet in next 4 the back of the fabric in the indicated places st increase in next st x 5 single_crochet in next 2 st 36 and guide it with two
